title: Help! When writing Emails, TB skips TWO lines whenever I press ENTER instead of to the next line.
content:
New to TB, Windows 11. Please... how can this be fixed? Or can it?

Whenever I write an email (doesn't matter if I'm replying to someone else's email, or starting a New Message), whenever I hit the ENTER key, TB leaves a DOUBLE SPACE between the lines.

So instead of looking like this (as every other program that has typing does):

Line 1 <Hit Enter> Line 2 <Hit Enter> Line 3 <Hit Enter>

It looks like this:

Line 1 <Hit Enter>

Line 2 <Hit Enter>

Line 3 <Hit Enter>

If I'm typing a long letter and DON'T hit ENTER, it'll do a word-wrap and continue the next line down, but if I hit ENTER, instead of going to the NEXT line, it'll go TWO lines down (leaving a blank line in between). Which makes it look terrible anytime I want to start a new line.

=====

On All OTHER programs (including this webpage as I'm typing this!) if <ENTER> I hit the ENTER key then <ENTER> it looks like this.

=====

But when writing an email on TB it looks like this:

=====

On All OTHER programs (including this webpage here as I'm typing this!) if <ENTER>

I hit the ENTER key then <ENTER>

it looks like this.

======

Is there a way to make TB just go down to the next line (like every other program I've ever used does) when hitting <ENTER> instead of always going down TWO lines?

Please help if you can. It's about my only complaint with TB, but it's a major one. My composed emails look terrible like this with TB. Thank you!

title: Thunderbird's weird behavior with the RSS feed (Medium.com)
content:
It started with Thunderbird 115.0.1, when Thunderbird couldn't fetch articles from the feed of Medium.com.

When I import a file (.opml) from Medium.com, Thunderbird only imports subscription feeds but does not fetch articles from them.

Manual subscription feed link url: 'https://medium.com/feed/tag/computer' through the 'Feed subscription' pop-up option, it stuck at loading fetch items, and I never saw the notification 'feed add'. (image 1).

I still can't auto-update feed items after a fixed amount of time or manually update them with 'get message' option. (Image 2 has feed import but does not fetch/update articles, and feed manual subscription via "Feed Subscription" can fetch articles but can't update.)

All Medium.com feeds have a loading icon. (Image 2)

Other feeds still work well, except Medium.com.

Thunderbird stable 102.15.0 (64 bit) works normally, but all versions starting from 115.0.1-supernova (stable, beta, and daily) have the same issue.

OS:

Windows 11 - 22H2 - 22621.1992
